post:
Dear LowEndTalk Users

**We now have a POP in Fremont (United States) and provide free tunnels there.**

[Tunnelbroker.ch](https://www.tunnelbroker.ch) is a free tunnel broker service, which allows you to reach the IPv6 Internet by tunneling over existing IPv4 connections from your IPv6-enabled host or router to one of our IPv6 routers.

**We provide free IPv6 Tunnels and Prefixes with RPKI (ROA)**:
> **IPv6 Prefix (from /48 to /44) $0.00/mo) - [Details](https://www.tunnelbroker.ch/prefix)**
> /44 to /48 IPv6 Prefixes
> Assigned to your ORG Object
> Authorization for your Maintainer Object
> RPKI Support
> RIPE Sub-Allocation
> Set own Geolocation
> Sub-Allocation from 2a0e:b107::/32


> **Tunnels (SIT or GRE) $0.00/mo) - [Details](https://www.tunnelbroker.ch/tunnel)**
> IPv4 BGP Session (optional)
> IPv6 BGP Session
> Automatic Prefix Filtering
> SIT (for IPv6) and GRE (DualStack)
> /64 Allocation for every Tunnel
> Locations: Zurich, Dusseldorf, London, Sandefjord and Fremont (NEW)


If you do not have an ASN yet, get your own AS number today and you will get a free IPv6 /48 subnet in addition:
> **ASN (32bit) RIPE Region - only CHF 75.00/one.off ($79.92/one-off) - [Order now](https://securebit.ch/order?id=a11)**
> Free IPv6 Subnet /48
> 32bit ASN
> RIPE Region
> Webinterface (Cloud Manager)

**Securebit AG** provides [virtual servers](https://securebit.ch/server/internet_exchange), [Colocation](https://www.securebit.ch/server/housing), [Internet Resouces (ASN, IPv4, IPv6)](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources) and other Solutions in data centers in Europe (Zurich, Frankfurt, Dusseldorf, Fremont and London).

Our services are based on latest HPE and DELL servers, offering outstanding performance and reliability . We also operate our own fully redundant network across multiple data centers.

Securebit AG was founded in 2018 and has more than 14 years of experience in the field of networks, virtualization and internet services.



**Find out more about Securebit AG and our offers:**

 * [Legal informations](https://www.securebit.ch/about/legal)

 * [Privacy](https://www.securebit.ch/about/privacy)

 * [Technology](https://www.securebit.ch/about/technology)

 * [Internet Resources (ASN, IPv4 and IPv6)](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources)

 * [Virtual Servers](https://www.securebit.ch/server/virtual) (you can connect to multiple Internet Exchanges)
